Description: Bronze axe-blade: with rounded corners to the cutting edge. It is quite thickly corroded. The line of the original haft is preserved. There are small indentations in the cutting edge.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Thebes (historic - Upper Egypt) (said to have come from)
Bibliographic references: Davies 1987 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities in the British Museum (113)
